author: Breitbart Jerusalem
description: Sara Netanyahu, PM Netanyahu’s wife, told First Lady Melania Trump that the two couples had more in common than pure geopolitical interests.
title: Sarah Netanyahu Tells Melania Trump of Common Bond: ‘Media Hate Us but the People Love Us’

author: Jack Moore
description: Sara Netanyahu’s comments were picked up on camera as President Trump and the First Lady arrived in Israel.
title: Mrs. Netanyahu tells Melania Trump "the media hates us. Like you."
